description: Simon's a cute young gunner grinning from ear to ear under his cap. He's only 20, and he's a pretty scrawny guy, weighing only 130 lbs. and measuring 5'8', but he's got a great spunky attitude and lots of love to give. He hails from Kentucky and actually I was introduced to him by Caleb, who told me his pal was hung like a giant (wonder how he knew that??) Simon's cock is huge, and not just long but he has to wrap almost the whole length of his fingers around his rod because it's got so much damn girth. A couple of times he sticks it straight up to give us the full view and let me tell you, it's a god-damned masterpiece.
title: Simon
